task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile App: Do the translation of the app in Bengali
description:
## Summary

You have to do translation of the our Mifos Mobile App into Bengali Language. We already have Bengali language file, but currently it have English String values only and some string values are missing. You have to add the missing values String values in Bengali and translate the existing ones in Bengali.

This would enable the localization feature app which is very much awaited feature in the community.
